{"id":467050616,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 11 months","timestamp":1615601340,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"24 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/467050616/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Palindrome","memory":"40.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public boolean isPalindrome(String s) {\n        s = s.replaceAll(\"[^a-zA-Z0-9]\", \"\"); //Using regex to replace any character except a-zA-Z0-9\n        s = s.toLowerCase();\n        char[] sChar = s.toCharArray();\n        int a = 0;\n        int z = sChar.length - 1;\n        while (a < z) {\n            if (sChar[a] != sChar[z]) {\n                return false;\n            } \n            a++;\n            z--;\n        }\n        return true;        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-palindrome","has_notes":false}
